betterquesting:10.desc:8:
In HV, you now technically have the ability to construct Megas for some machines. These absolute titans will boost your production to levels never-before-seen, at a price. These multiblocks have two major benefits:
-They innately have 256 parallels.
-They can use TecTech exotic hatches, allowing you to empty out tremendous amounts of power into them.

[note]To get real benefit from these multis, you will want to use lots of power and take advantage of their extreme parallelization - consider whether or not you can actually make use of these before you go off building a Mega Blast Furnace in HV...[/note]
